archways-or-doorframes.private: Architectural features that create passageways or frames within the composition.

subtle-crowds-in-motion.private: Small groups of people moving gently, adding life without overpowering the scene.

trees-framing-the-subject.private: Trees positioned to frame the main subject, enhancing focus and depth.

rippling-water.private: Water surfaces with gentle waves or ripples, adding movement and tranquility.

low-walls-or-barriers.private: Short structures that segment the space, providing boundaries and structure.

rows-of-statues.private: Aligned statues that add symmetry, historical context, or artistic flair.

fragmented-ruins.private: Broken and scattered remnants of structures, suggesting history and decay.

faint-glowing-lights.private: Softly illuminated sources that add subtle illumination and atmosphere.

rolling-hills.private: Gently undulating hills that create a sense of vastness and natural beauty.

crumbling-architecture.private: Decaying buildings or structures that introduce a sense of age and abandonment.
